required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial to Study Neladenoson Bialanate Over 20 Weeks in Patients With Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group, Double Blind, Dose-finding Phase II Trial to Study the Efficacy, Safety, Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Effects of the Oral Partial Adenosine A1 Receptor Agonist Neladenoson Bialanate Over 20 Weeks in Patients With Chronic Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to find the optimal dose of once daily oral neladenoson bialanate (BAY 1067197) when given in addition to standard therapy for heart failure with reduced ejection fraction (HFrEF).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) (%) at Week 20 Measured by Echocardiography
primary_outcome.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) was measured by echocardiography. Mean and standard deviation were reported.

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Log-transformed NT-pro B-type Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) at Week 20
primary_outcome.description: NT-pro b-type Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) was measured. Mean and standard deviation were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Left Ventricular End-Systolic Volume (LVESV) at Week 20
secondary_outcome.description: LVESV was defined as the volume of blood in the left ventricle at the end of contraction, or systole and the beginning of filling or diastole. Mean and standard deviation were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Left Ventricular End-Diastolic Volume (LVEDV) at Week 20
secondary_outcome.description: LVEDV was defined as the volume of blood in the left ventricle at end load or filling in diastole or the amount of blood in the ventricles just before systole. Mean and standard deviation were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in High Sensitivity Troponin T (Hs-TNT) at Week 20
secondary_outcome.description: High sensitivity troponin T (hs-TNT) was measured. Mean and standard deviation were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Composite Efficacy Outcome
secondary_outcome.description: Composite efficacy outcome was the first occurrence of CV death, HF hospitalization or urgent visit for HF. Number of participants with composite efficacy outcome were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Cardiovascular (CV) Mortality
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiovascular (CV) mortality was assessed. Number of participants with CV mortality were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Heart Failure (HF) Hospitalization and Urgent Visits for Heart Failure (HF)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with HF hospitalization and urgent visits for HF were reported.

arm_group.description: Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
Chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction

intervention.description: 5 mg orally once daily for 20 weeks
10 mg orally once daily for 20 weeks
20 mg orally once daily for 20 weeks
30 mg orally once daily for 20 weeks
40 mg orally once daily for 20 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men or women aged 18 years and older
- Diagnosis of chronic heart failure (CHF), NYHA ( New York Heart Association ) class II-IV, LVEF ≤ 35% and elevated NT-proBNP
Exclusion Criteria:
- Acute de-novo heart failure
- Requirement of any intravenous (IV) treatments following 48 hours prior to randomization
- Mechanical support (e.g. intra-aortic balloon pump, endotracheal intubation, mechanical ventilation, or any ventricular assist device)
- Any cause of chronic heart failure other than ischemic cardiomyopathy and idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy

clinical_study.keyword: Heart Failure with Reduced Ejection Fraction

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Study was conducted at multiple centers in 11 countries between 22 February 2017 (first participant first visit) and 16 May 2018 (last participant last visit).
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Overall, 462 participants were screened. Of them, 35 participants did not complete screening due to unmet eligibility criteria, consent withdrawal, adverse events and other unspecified reasons. In total, 427 participants were randomized and 426 participants received study treatment.

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants received placebo matched to neladenoson bialanate tablets orally once daily for 20 weeks.

measure.title: Age
Sex: Female, Male
Ethnicity (NIH/OMB)
Race (NIH/OMB)

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

measure.title: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF)
measure.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) is defined as the fraction of blood being pumped out of the left ventricle of the heart with each contraction.

measure.title: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class
measure.description: NYHA classifies the extent of heart failure as Class I: Cardiac disease without resulting limitation of physical activity, Class II: Cardiac disease resulting in slight limitation of physical activity, Class III: Cardiac disease resulting in marked limitation of physical activity and Class IV: Cardiac disease resulting in inability to carry out any physical activity without discomfort.

measure.title: N-terminal pro-hormone b-type natriuretic peptide (NT-proBNP)
Medical history: Chronic heart failure etiology
Medical history: Atrial fibrillation
Medication of interest: Beta-blocker
Medication of interest: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor
Medication of interest: Angiotensin receptor blocker
Medication of interest: Angiotensin receptor-neprilysin inhibitor
Medication of interest: Mineralocorticoid receptor antagonist

outcome.title: Absolute Change From Baseline in Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) (%) at Week 20 Measured by Echocardiography
outcome.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) was measured by echocardiography. Mean and standard deviation were reported.
outcome.population: Per-protocol set (PPS) included all participants without validity findings affecting efficacy evaluation. The participants with invalid/missing baseline or missing post-baseline LVEF values not due to cardiovascular (CV) death or heart failure (HF) hospitalization or with other major protocol deviation were excluded from PPS LVEF set.

measure.title: Absolute Change From Baseline in Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) (%) at Week 20 Measured by Echocardiography
measure.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) was measured by echocardiography. Mean and standard deviation were reported.
measure.population: Per-protocol set (PPS) included all participants without validity findings affecting efficacy evaluation. The participants with invalid/missing baseline or missing post-baseline LVEF values not due to cardiovascular (CV) death or heart failure (HF) hospitalization or with other major protocol deviation were excluded from PPS LVEF set.

analysis.p_value_desc: Linear dose-response shape: The multiple comparison procedures (MCP) approach was applied to calculate the adjusted one-sided one-sided p-values of the contrast test.
analysis.method_desc: Dose response relationship was assessed using the MCP-Mod method combining MCP principles with modeling techniques under model uncertainty.

analysis.p_value_desc: Sigmoidal Emax 1 dose-response shape: The MCP approach was applied to calculate the adjusted one-sided p-values of the contrast test.
analysis.method_desc: Dose response relationship was assessed using the MCP-Mod method combining MCP principles with modeling techniques under model uncertainty.

analysis.p_value_desc: Sigmoidal Emax 2 dose-response shape: The MCP approach was applied to calculate the adjusted one-sided p-values of the contrast test.
analysis.method_desc: Dose response relationship was assessed using the MCP-Mod method combining MCP principles with modeling techniques under model uncertainty.

analysis.p_value_desc: Emax dose-response shape: The MCP approach was applied to calculate the adjusted one-sided p-values of the contrast test.
analysis.method_desc: Dose response relationship was assessed using the MCP-Mod method combining MCP principles with modeling techniques under model uncertainty.

analysis.p_value_desc: Quadratic dose-response shape: The MCP approach was applied to calculate the adjusted one-sided p-values of the contrast test.
analysis.method_desc: Dose response relationship was assessed using the MCP-Mod method combining MCP principles with modeling techniques under model uncertainty.

outcome.title: Absolute Change From Baseline in Log-transformed NT-pro B-type Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) at Week 20
outcome.description: NT-pro b-type Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) was measured. Mean and standard deviation were reported.
outcome.population: PPS included all participants without validity findings affecting efficacy evaluation. The participants with invalid/missing baseline or missing post-baseline BNP value not due to CV death or HF hospitalization or with other major protocol deviation were excluded from the PPS BNP.

group.title: Neladenoson Bialanate 30mg
group.description: Participants received 30 mg of neladenoson bialanate tablets orally once daily for 20 weeks.

group.title: Neladenoson Bialanate 40mg
group.description: Participants received 40 mg of neladenoson bialanate tablets orally once daily for 20 weeks.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 30 days but less than or equal to 90 days from the time submitted to the sponsor for review. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
